name: Expert Tax - Stockholm - Median Foreign Specialist
description: Foreign specialist earning SEK 600,000 in Stockholm with Expert Tax regime

sources.description: Expert Tax: Only 75% of income is taxable. Stockholm 30.60%, grundavdrag SEK 17,300, jobbskatteavdrag
sources.notes: Gross after 25% exemption: 450,000. Taxable: 450,000 - 17,300 = 432,700. Municipal tax: 432,700 Ã— 30.60% = 132,406. Work credit: ~40,000. Net tax: ~126,000. Net: 474,000
